title: Tech primed for three-game weekend with Wright State - VT hokiesports.com
content: Tech primed for three-game weekend with Wright State  VT hokiesports.com
description: One of four unbeaten programs remaining in the ACC, the Virginia Tech baseball team (7-0) will ready itself for a sharp non-conference test at home this weekend when the Hokies face Wright State (0-6) during a three-game series at English Field at Atlantic Union Bank Park (March 4-6).
